snippet.title: Samoa Rugby Union to cast their net wide in pursuit of a new coach
snippet.content: The Samoa Rugby Union has begun the search for a new national coach after Alama Ieremia handed in his resignation, saying he felt his decision was in the best interests of his beloved Manu Samoa team. The Chief Executive of the SRU, Vincent Fepuleai, says the coach's position had become untenable in the face of results, and fierce criticism from supporters.
